name: infra-seed
description: Scaffolds cloud infrastructure from a single YAML manifest. Generates Terraform modules, CI pipelines, and environment configs.

name: pipestream
description: Lightweight ETL framework for event-driven data pipelines. Supports backpressure, dead-letter queues, and pluggable connectors for Postgres, S3, and Kafka.

name: diffscope
description: Code review agent that parses git diffs, builds AST context per file, and generates inline comments using structured LLM output.

name: tokenkit
description: Go library for token counting and chunk splitting across OpenAI, Anthropic, and local model tokenizers. Used in RAG preprocessing.

name: deploy-gate
description: Deployment gating service that runs smoke tests, checks canary metrics, and auto-promotes or rolls back releases via GitHub Actions webhooks.
